Home.title: Subscriptions and invoicing for ambitious businesses
Home.description: Stripe Billing is the fastest way for your business to bill customers with subscriptions or invoices. Capture more revenue, support new products or business models, and accept recurring payments globally.

OnboardingFlow.title: Create Stripe Subscription channel
OnboardingFlow.successMessage: Stripe Subscription Channel was created successfully

CheckoutSettings.copy: To enable subscription functionality on your storefront, your theme needs to be updated to handle rendering of the subscribe and subscription management content.
CheckoutSettings.stepTwoTitle: Create a copy of your theme and open the Theme Files Editor
CheckoutSettings.stepThreeTitle: Copy and paste the following code into your Product Detail Page. This is where the Subscribe and Save widget will be rendered.
CheckoutSettings.stepThreeSubtitle: For the Cornerstone theme, try placing at the end of this file: /templates/components/products/add-to-cart.html
CheckoutSettings.stepFourTitle: Copy and paste the following code into your account navigation template. This will allow customers to manage their existing subscriptions.
CheckoutSettings.stepFourSubtitle: For the Cornerstone theme, try placing at the end of this file: /templates/components/account/navigation.html

DisplaySettings.title: Display settings
DisplaySettings.descriptionLineOne: Configure the look and feel of the subscription widget that will be added to your product detail pages.
DisplaySettings.descriptionLineTwo: This is only available for merchants using the BigCommerce Stencil Theme Engine -
DisplaySettings.subsWidgetDescription: Define the header text for the subscription widget.
DisplaySettings.addToCardDescription: Define the display text for the Add to Card button
DisplaySettings.widgetColorsDesc: Define the text, background and button colors for the widget.

StripeConnect.connectText: Connect your Stripe account with BigCommerce to continue setting up subscriptions.
StripeConnect.connectedText: You're connected to the following account: {name}

SubscriptionEditPane.title: Edit Product Subscription
SubscriptionEditPane.saveSuccessText: Subscription Config for [{sku}] was successfully saved

SubscriptionEditPanel.frequenciesCopy: Configure the subscription frequencies and discounts you'd like to offer. By default, this will be inherited by all products enabled for subscriptions. This can be customized per-product within your catalog.
